title: Shop
description: Put this antibacterial toilet cleaner to work in bathrooms for completely sanitized and fresh toilet bowls. Plant soap and natural minerals provide a non-toxic, biodegradable clean, leaving nothing behind but the aromatherapeutic scent of triumph. Filled with 3 oz of concentrated cleaner—just add water! 16 oz / 473 ml glass bottle
sitename: City Maid Green | Non-Toxic, Plant Based Cleaning Products
